import React, { useState } from 'react' import Logo from '../images/logosp.png' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MdMenu, MdClose } from 'react-icons/md' import '../mobileStyle.css'; export default function Navbar() { // show and close mobile menu const [showNav, setShowNav] = useState(false) // active link in nav const [hoveredItem, setHoveredItem] = useState(""); const resetHover = () => setHoveredItem(""); return ( < nav className="navbar" >
setShowNav(!showNav)}>
    setShowNav(!showNav)}>

) }
